Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment:
Not sure why you do this. It could change control flow, e.g. it’s not obvious to me that con_update_parents_urgency() which is called later is not necessary to call, even when the container’s urgency stays the same. Same for the timers.

If you really want to have this change, i suggest putting it into a separate patch and focusing on the window::urgent event in this patch :).

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: you’re missing a docs/ipc update, right?

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: it's an issue with multimonitor and sending two events when the con becomes not urgent. I think there is an issue this solves with multimonitor where the con loses urgency but is never focused. I'll look that a little more.
